titles.title: To require the Commodity Futures Trading Commission to establish an Office of Minority and Women Inclusion, and for other purposes.
To require the Commodity Futures Trading Commission to establish an Office of Minority and Women Inclusion, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Commodity Exchanges, Energy, and Credit.

committee.name: House Agriculture
committee.subcommittee: Commodity Markets, Digital Assets, and Rural Development

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary: This bill establishes at the Commodity Futures Trading Commission an Office of Minority and Women Inclusion and an internship program.
